timeline.message:
Create module structure

Signed-off-by: Geoffroy Jamgotchian <geoffroy.jamgotchian@rte-france.com>

Create all objects necessary for ieee14

Signed-off-by: Geoffroy Jamgotchian <geoffroy.jamgotchian@rte-france.com>

Fix field order

Signed-off-by: Geoffroy Jamgotchian <geoffroy.jamgotchian@rte-france.com>

Parse all equipments except transformers

Signed-off-by: Geoffroy Jamgotchian <geoffroy.jamgotchian@rte-france.com>

Fix code coverage

Signed-off-by: Geoffroy Jamgotchian <geoffroy.jamgotchian@gmail.com>

Add missing records

Signed-off-by: Geoffroy Jamgotchian <geoffroy.jamgotchian@rte-france.com>

timeline.bodyText:
Load scaling flag of one for a scalable load and zero for a fixed load

Fixed: I change the type of the scale attribute to an int
timeline.author: mathbagu
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,172 @@
+/**
+ * Copyright (c) 2020, RTE (http://www.rte-france.com)
+ * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
+ * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
+ * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
+ */
+package com.powsybl.psse.model;
+
+import com.univocity.parsers.annotations.Parsed;
+import com.univocity.parsers.annotations.Validate;
+
+/**
+ *
+ * @author Geoffroy Jamgotchian <geoffroy.jamgotchian at rte-france.com>
+ */
+public class PsseLoad {
+
+    @Parsed(index = 0)
+    @Validate
+    private int i;
+
+    @Parsed(index = 1)
+    private String id = "1";
+
+    @Parsed(index = 2)
+    private int status = 1;
+
+    @Parsed(index = 3)
+    private int area = -1;
+
+    @Parsed(index = 4)
+    private int zone = -1;
+
+    @Parsed(index = 5)
+    private double pl = 0;
+
+    @Parsed(index = 6)
+    private double ql = 0;
+
+    @Parsed(index = 7)
+    private double ip = 0;
+
+    @Parsed(index = 8)
+    private double iq = 0;
+
+    @Parsed(index = 9)
+    private double yp = 0;
+
+    @Parsed(index = 10)
+    private double yq = 0;
+
+    @Parsed(index = 11)
+    private int owner = -1;
+
+    @Parsed(index = 12)
+    private double scale = 1;

timeline.bodyText:
Interruptible load flag of one for an interruptible load for zero for a non interruptible load.

Fixed: I change the type of the intrpt attribute to an int
timeline.author: mathbagu

timeline.bodyText: The default value of met should be 1.
timeline.author: annetill
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,285 @@
+/**

+ * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
+ * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this

+ */
+package com.powsybl.psse.model;
+
+import com.univocity.parsers.annotations.Parsed;
+import com.univocity.parsers.annotations.Validate;
+
+/**
+ *
+ * @author Geoffroy Jamgotchian <geoffroy.jamgotchian at rte-france.com>
+ */
+public class PsseNonTransformerBranch {
+
+    @Parsed(index = 0)
+    @Validate
+    private int i;
+
+    @Parsed(index = 1)
+    @Validate
+    private int j;
+
+    @Parsed(index = 2)
+    private String ckt = "1";
+
+    @Parsed(index = 3)
+    @Validate
+    private double r;
+
+    @Parsed(index = 4)
+    @Validate
+    private double x;
+
+    @Parsed(index = 5)
+    private double b = 0;
+
+    @Parsed(index = 6)
+    private double ratea = 0;
+
+    @Parsed(index = 7)
+    private double rateb = 0;
+
+    @Parsed(index = 8)
+    private double ratec = 0;
+
+    @Parsed(index = 9)
+    private double gi = 0;
+
+    @Parsed(index = 10)
+    private double bi = 0;
+
+    @Parsed(index = 11)
+    private double gj = 0;
+
+    @Parsed(index = 12)
+    private double bj = 0;
+
+    @Parsed(index = 13)
+    private int st = 1;
+
+    @Parsed(index = 14)
+    private int met = 0;

timeline.bodyText: Why do you prefer to set the default value to NaN here whereas no default value is allowed as for x12 ?
timeline.author: annetill

replies.bodyText: No default value is allowed in case of 3 windings transformers but this field is not present in case of 2 windings transformers.
replies.author: geofjamg

timeline.bodyText: Same comment, no default value is allowed for x31.
timeline.author: annetill

timeline.bodyText: The default value is the whole system base in MVA, how to set it correctly ?
timeline.author: annetill

replies.bodyText: Either at the conversion level or in a data model loading post processing.
replies.author: geofjamg

timeline.bodyText: The default value is the whole system base in MVA, how to set it correctly ?
timeline.author: annetill

timeline.bodyText: The default value is the whole system base in MVA, how to set it correctly ?
timeline.author: annetill

timeline.bodyText: Here too the default value setting is more complex and need linked between objects. You put Nan to remember that a more complex treatement has to be done ?
timeline.author: annetill

replies.bodyText: At the end of all the records ?
replies.author: annetill

timeline.bodyText: Same remarks as before: the default value setting is more complex and we have to keep that in mind for later.
timeline.author: annetill
annetill
annetill

timeline.bodyText: Same remark, we have to keep in mind.
